instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2347: What is 820-2347? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: imac a1224 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2347</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Ghost Lcd
threads.message:
Hi,
The screen became like this after we replaced its ssd. What may be causing this? 
There was no such problem before, also when connected by hdmi, it's normal.[ATTACH type="full"]59669[/ATTACH]

threads.message:
i checked lcd cable, its working. 

It happened after I disassembled and installed cable a few times. I think any part might be broken. Where do I have to start for check it?

threads.title: imac a1224 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2347</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Ghost Lcd
threads.message: You should test with known good video cable and screen too.
